verses.verse: A Psalm of thanksgiving. Make a joyful noise <S%H7321><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, all ye lands <S%H776><s%>.
Serve <S%H5647><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> with gladness <S%H8057><s%>: Come <S%H935><s%> before his presence <S%H6440><s%> with singing <S%H7445><s%>.

Know <S%H3045><s%> ye that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, he is God <S%H430><s%>: It is he that hath made <S%H6213><s%> us <S%H5971><s%>, and we are his; We are his people, and the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of his pasture <S%H4830><s%>.

Enter <S%H935><s%> into his gates <S%H8179><s%> with thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%>, And into his courts <S%H2691><s%> with praise <S%H8416><s%>: Give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto him <S%H1288><s%>, and bless his name <S%H8034><s%>.
For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%>; His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>, And his faithfulness <S%H530><s%> unto all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>.
